about_the_game:
Desktop Mascot Wanwano-.
Cute characters move around under your PC screen.

Wanwano-
Left drag: Grab
（Right-click (when in standby mode): stroke.
Feeding balloon: Feeds the character.
Sleep: Sleep in the hut when tired.

Hut
Left drag: Grab
Right click: Menu

Options
Small/Big：Change the size of the character.
Monitor change：Switches the monitor if there are multiple monitors.

Other menu
Save & Exit: Saves and exits.
x: Closes the menu.

DEMO Version
Some activities, such as fishing, are not available.
No save is made.
detailed_description:
Desktop Mascot Wanwano-.
Cute characters move around under your PC screen.

Wanwano-
Left drag: Grab
（Right-click (when in standby mode): stroke.
Feeding balloon: Feeds the character.
Sleep: Sleep in the hut when tired.

Hut
Left drag: Grab
Right click: Menu

Options
Small/Big：Change the size of the character.
Monitor change：Switches the monitor if there are multiple monitors.

Other menu
Save & Exit: Saves and exits.
x: Closes the menu.

DEMO Version
Some activities, such as fishing, are not available.
No save is made.
name: Desktop Wanwano- DEMO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Desktop Mascot Wanwano-. Cute characters move around under your PC screen. Some functions are limited in the DEMO version.
